13  package net.sf.oval.test.guard;
14  
15  import java.lang.reflect.Method;
16  
17  import junit.framework.TestCase;
18  import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertFieldConstraints;
19  import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertFieldConstraintsCheck;
20  import net.sf.oval.constraint.AssertTrue;
21  import net.sf.oval.constraint.Length;
22  import net.sf.oval.constraint.MatchPattern;
23  import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotEmpty;
24  import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNull;
25  import net.sf.oval.context.FieldContext;
26  import net.sf.oval.context.MethodParameterContext;
27  import net.sf.oval.exception.ConstraintsViolatedException;
28  import net.sf.oval.guard.ConstraintsViolatedAdapter;
29  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guard;
30  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guarded;
31  
32  /**
33   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
34   */
35  public class ApplyFieldConstraintsToParametersTest extends TestCase
36  {
37  	@Guarded
38  	protected static class Person
39  	{
40  		@NotNull(message = "NOT_NULL")
41  		private String firstName = "";
42  
43  		@AssertTrue(message = "ASSERT_TRUE")
44  		private boolean isValid = true;
45  
46  		@NotNull(message = "NOT_NULL")
47  		private String lastName = "";
48  
49  		@NotNull(message = "NOT_NULL")
50  		@Length(max = 6, message = "LENGTH")
51  		@NotEmpty(message = "NOT_EMPTY")
52  		@MatchPattern(pattern = "^[0-9]*$", message = "REG_EX")
53  		private String zipCode = "1";
54  
55  		public String getFirstName()
56  		{
57  			return firstName;
58  		}
59  
60  		public String getLastName()
61  		{
62  			return lastName;
63  		}
64  
65  		public String getZipCode()
66  		{
67  			return zipCode;
68  		}
69  
70  		public boolean isValid()
71  		{
72  			return isValid;
73  		}
74  
75  		public void setDummyFirstName(@AssertFieldConstraints(value = "firstName") final String dummyFirstName)
76  		{
77  		// doing interesting stuff here
78  		}
79  
80  		public void setFirstName(@AssertFieldConstraints final String firstName)
81  		{
82  			this.firstName = firstName;
83  		}
84  
85  		public void setLastName(@AssertFieldConstraints final String lastName)
86  		{
87  			this.lastName = lastName;
88  		}
89  
90  		public void setValid(@AssertFieldConstraints final boolean isValid)
91  		{
92  			this.isValid = isValid;
93  		}
94  
95  		public void setZipCode(@AssertFieldConstraints final String zipCode)
96  		{
97  			this.zipCode = zipCode;
98  		}
99  
100 		public void setZipCode2(final String zipCode)
101 		{
102 			this.zipCode = zipCode;
103 		}
104 	}
105 
106 	@Guarded
107 	protected static class PersonService
108 	{
109 		public Person[] findPersonsByZipCode(@AssertFieldConstraints(declaringClass = Person.class) final String zipCode)
110 		{
111 			return null;
112 		}
113 	}
114 
115 	public void testFieldConstraintsFromDifferentClass()
116 	{
117 		final PersonService ps = new PersonService();
118 
119 		try
120 		{
121 			ps.findPersonsByZipCode(null);
122 			fail();
123 		}
124 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
125 		{
126 			assertEquals(1, ex.getConstraintViolations().length);
127 			assertEquals("NOT_NULL", ex.getMessage());
128 			assertEquals(MethodParameterContext.class, ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getContext().getClass());
129 			assertEquals(FieldContext.class, ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getCheckDeclaringContext().getClass());
130 		}
131 
132 		try
133 		{
134 			ps.findPersonsByZipCode("foobar");
135 			fail();
136 		}
137 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
138 		{
139 			assertEquals("REG_EX", ex.getMessage());
140 		}
141 	}
142 
143 	/**
144 	 * by default constraints specified for a field are also used for validating
145 	 * method parameters of the corresponding setter methods 
146 	 */
147 	public void testSetterValidation() throws Exception
148 	{
149 		final Person p = new Person();
150 
151 		final Guard guard = new Guard();
152 		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().setGuard(guard);
153 
154 		guard.enableProbeMode(p);
155 
156 		final ConstraintsViolatedAdapter va = new ConstraintsViolatedAdapter();
157 		guard.addListener(va, p);
158 
159 		// test @Length(max=)
160 		p.setFirstName("Mike");
161 		p.setLastName("Mahoney");
162 		p.setZipCode("1234567");
163 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
164 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
165 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("LENGTH"));
166 		va.clear();
167 
168 		// test @NotEmpty
169 		p.setZipCode("");
170 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
171 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
172 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("NOT_EMPTY"));
173 		va.clear();
174 
175 		// test @RegEx
176 		p.setZipCode("dffd34");
177 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
178 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
179 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("REG_EX"));
180 		va.clear();
181 
182 		// test @AssertTrue
183 		p.setValid(false);
184 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
185 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
186 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("ASSERT_TRUE"));
187 		va.clear();
188 
189 		// test @FieldConstraint("fieldname")
190 		p.setDummyFirstName(null);
191 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
192 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
193 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("NOT_NULL"));
194 		va.clear();
195 
196 		// test dynamic introduction of FieldConstraintsCheck
197 		{
198 			p.setZipCode2("dffd34");
199 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 0);
200 		}
201 		{
202 			final Method setter = p.getClass().getMethod("setZipCode2", new Class< ? >[]{String.class});
203 			final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check = new AssertFieldConstraintsCheck();
204 			guard.addChecks(setter, 0, check);
205 			p.setZipCode2("dffd34");
206 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
207 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
208 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("REG_EX"));
209 			va.clear();
210 			guard.removeChecks(setter, 0, check);
211 		}
212 		{
213 			final Method setter = p.getClass().getMethod("setZipCode2", new Class< ? >[]{String.class});
214 			final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check = new AssertFieldConstraintsCheck();
215 			check.setFieldName("firstName");
216 			guard.addChecks(setter, 0, check);
217 			p.setZipCode2("dffd34");
218 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 0);
219 			p.setZipCode2(null);
220 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
221 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
222 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("NOT_NULL"));
223 			va.clear();
224 			guard.removeChecks(setter, 0, check);
225 		}
226 		{
227 			p.setZipCode2("dffd34");
228 			assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 0);
229 		}
230 	}
231 }
